allQuestions.question: He said to me, 'Can you do these sums for me?'

option.label: He asked me if I could do those sums for him.
He asked me if I can do these sums for him.
He asked me if I can do those sums for him.
He asked me if I could do these sums for him.

allQuestions.question: Which of the following word is a verb?
'Pass away' means??
Your conduct admits ___ no excuess
Ravi said to the judge, 'I did not commit this crime.'

option.label: Ravi said to the judge that he did not committed the crime.
Ravi said to the judge that he had not committed the crime.
Ravi said to the judge that he had not committed that crime.
Ravi said to the judge that he had not committed this crime.
